amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit funds from being used to regulate trailers under the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Loudermilk amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Loudermilk.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Loudermilk amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
